answers.answer: Hi,I am neither of those people you asked how they were doing, but I just wanted to say those pics are AMAZING!!!  I love the side view one!!!!  CONGRATS!!!
Oh, thank you so much!!!  I just had to share.  Have a great weekend!!!
That is so cool! I can't wait until I can do it! Congrats!

OMG, I can't believe he is so gorgeous! Geeze, how real is that??? I'm 9w2d, feel fine. Exhausted, but fine. (worries the heck out of me) I'll feel a ton better when we can pick up the hb w/the doppler.I am having Lunch w/Tina & Zevasmom tomorrow. I'm really excited to put faces w/names, hee, hee. I don't know where the heck Jaces sped off to.Sooo glad you passed your glucose too!!
have fun meeting tomorrow, be sure to take pictures and post them so we can see how much fun ya'll had!!!

question: Hi Kelly/ Jaces/ Tina.  We had a 4D ultrasound yesterday and I wanted to post you a few pictures of my little man!  My mom says he has my lips and nose!http://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa269/baboojamaica/4D-32.jpghttp://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa269/baboojamaica/4D-26.jpghttp://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa269/baboojamaica/4D-19.jpghttp://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa269/baboojamaica/4D-14.jpghttp://i203.photobucket.com/albums/aa269/baboojamaica/4D-10.jpgAlso, I got my results back on my 3 hour glucose today- PASSED!  Thank goodness.  We were really scared I would have gestational diabetes after my mom was just diagnosed with Adult diabetes and I failed my first test.  But otherwise, all is good.Jaces, how are you doing?  Haven't heard a peep from you lately.Tina, have you tested?????Kelly, how are you feeling? Morning sickness??
title: 4D U/S pictures
